item.name: Alabaster Leech
item.text: White spells you cast cost {W} more to cast.
item.flavorText: "Its stones seem to serve a healing function, but removing them intact is an exhausting process." —Tolarian research notes

item.name: Angel of Mercy
item.text: Flying When Angel of Mercy enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
item.flavorText: "In times like these, people need to be reminded of compassion." —Sisay

item.name: Ardent Soldier
item.text: Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.) Vigilance If Ardent Soldier was kicked, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.

item.name: Atalya, Samite Master
item.text: {X}, {T}: Choose one — Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn; or you gain X life. Spend only white mana this way.
item.flavorText: "Healing is a gift the divine ones have shared with us. It is a sacred trust."

item.name: Benalish Emissary
item.text: Kicker {1}{G} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} as you cast this spell.) When Benalish Emissary enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target land.

item.name: Benalish Heralds
item.text: {3}{U}, {T}: Draw a card.
item.flavorText: The detailed dispatch could be summarized in four words: "Time is running out."

item.name: Benalish Lancer
item.text: Kicker {2}{W} (You may pay an additional {2}{W} as you cast this spell.) If Benalish Lancer was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with first strike.

item.name: Benalish Trapper
item.text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
item.flavorText: "I'm up here. You're down there. Now who's the lower life form?"

item.name: Blinding Light
item.text: Tap all nonwhite creatures.
item.flavorText: An angel's sword impales only the body; her righteousness penetrates the soul.

item.name: Capashen Unicorn
item.text: {1}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Capashen Unicorn: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
item.flavorText: Capashen riders were stern and humorless even before their ancestral home was reduced to rubble.

item.name: Crimson Acolyte
item.text: Protection from red {W}: Target creature gains protection from red until end of turn.
item.flavorText: The faithful will walk through streams of fire and emerge unscathed. —Crimson acolyte creed

item.name: Crusading Knight
item.text: Protection from black Crusading Knight gets +1/+1 for each Swamp your opponents control.
item.flavorText: "My only dream is to destroy the nightmares of others."

item.name: Death or Glory
item.text: Separate all creature cards in your graveyard into two piles. Exile the pile of an opponent's choice and return the other to the battlefield.

item.name: Dismantling Blow
item.text: Kicker {2}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{U} as you cast this spell.) Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If Dismantling Blow was kicked, draw two cards.

item.name: Divine Presence
item.text: If a source would deal 4 or more damage to a creature or player, that source deals 3 damage to that creature or player instead.
item.flavorText: "Serra's light isn't easily extinguished." —Reya Dawnbringer

item.name: Fight or Flight
item.text: At the beginning of each opponent's combat, separate all creatures that player controls into two piles. Only creatures in the pile of his or her choice can attack this turn.

item.name: Glimmering Angel
item.text: Flying {U}: Glimmering Angel gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
item.flavorText: "We turned to see where the blow came from and saw only a distant light." —Capashen lord

item.name: Global Ruin
item.text: Each player chooses from the lands he or she controls a land of each basic land type, then sacrifices the rest.
item.flavorText: "The earth shook, the sky rained fire, and it seemed the world was ending." —Benalish refugee

item.name: Harsh Judgment
item.text: As Harsh Judgment enters the battlefield, choose a color. If an instant or sorcery spell of the chosen color would deal damage to you, it deals that damage to its controller instead.
item.flavorText: "At least they remember me." —Gerrard

item.name: Holy Day
item.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
item.flavorText: "Will history remember this as the day demons arrived or the day saviors arrived?" —Barrin

item.name: Liberate
item.text: Exile target creature you control. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
item.flavorText: "Not everyone gets a second chance." —Hanna

item.name: Obsidian Acolyte
item.text: Protection from black {W}: Target creature gains protection from black until end of turn.
item.flavorText: The truthful will stand in the gaze of death and escape unharmed. —Obsidian acolyte creed

item.name: Orim's Touch
item.text: Kicker {1} (You may pay an additional {1} as you cast this spell.) Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn. If Orim's Touch was kicked, prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt to that creature or player this turn instead.

item.name: Pledge of Loyalty
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has protection from the colors of permanents you control. This effect doesn't remove Pledge of Loyalty.
item.flavorText: Urza convinced many Dominarians not only to set aside their differences, but to embrace them.

item.name: Prison Barricade
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Kicker {1}{W} (You may pay an additional {1}{W} as you cast this spell.) If Prison Barricade was kicked, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and with "Prison Barricade can attack as though it didn't have defender."

item.name: Protective Sphere
item.text: {1}, Pay 1 life: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by a source of your choice that shares a color with the mana spent on this activation cost. (Colorless mana prevents no damage.)

item.name: Pure Reflection
item.text: Whenever a player casts a creature spell, destroy all Reflections. Then that player puts an X/X white Reflection creature token onto the battlefield, where X is the converted mana cost of that spell.

item.name: Rampant Elephant
item.text: {G}: Target creature blocks Rampant Elephant this turn if able.
item.flavorText: No matter how righteous the cause, it helps to bring along some muscle.

item.name: Razorfoot Griffin
item.text: Flying First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
item.flavorText: "Do griffins fight to defend their homes or purely for sport?" —Sisay

item.name: Restrain
item.text:
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target attacking creature this turn.
Draw a card.
item.flavorText: "Hanna would give up her own life before she'd abandon the Weatherlight." —Sisay

item.name: Reviving Dose
item.text: You gain 3 life. Draw a card.
item.flavorText: As healers battled each plague, they learned more about the next.

item.name: Rewards of Diversity
item.text: Whenever an opponent casts a multicolored spell, you gain 4 life.
item.flavorText: "Everything is in place. Nothing can happen that isn't part of my plan." —Urza

item.name: Reya Dawnbringer
item.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
item.flavorText: A beacon of hope for a battered army.

item.name: Rout
item.text: You may cast Rout any time you could cast an instant if you pay {2} more to cast it. Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

item.name: Ruham Djinn
item.text:
First strike
Ruham Djinn gets -2/-2 as long as white is the most common color among all permanents or is tied for most common.

item.name: Samite Ministration
item.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by a source of your choice. Whenever damage from a black or red source is prevented this way this turn, you gain that much life.

item.name: Shackles
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. {W}: Return Shackles to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: "It could be worse," said Gerrard, looking around. "Well, maybe not."

item.name: Spirit of Resistance
item.text: If you control a permanent of each color, prevent all damage that would be dealt to you.
item.flavorText: "Our victory must come from all of Dominaria, or it will not come." —Urza

item.name: Spirit Weaver
item.text: {2}: Target green or blue creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Let my hope be your shield."

item.name: Strength of Unity
item.text: Enchant creature Domain — Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each basic land type among lands you control.
item.flavorText: All Dominarians agreed on one thing: they would not go down without a fight.

item.name: Sunscape Apprentice
item.text: {G}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. {U}, {T}: Put target creature you control on top of its owner's library.

item.name: Sunscape Master
item.text: {G}{G}, {T}: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn. {U}{U}, {T}: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

item.name: Teferi's Care
item.text:
{W}, Sacrifice an enchantment: Destroy target enchantment.
{3}{U}{U}: Counter target enchantment spell.
item.flavorText: "If I do nothing else, I will protect my people." —Teferi

item.name: Wayfaring Giant
item.text: Domain — Wayfaring Giant gets +1/+1 for each basic land type among lands you control.
item.flavorText: Its stature and stride increase with each step it takes.

item.name: Winnow
item.text: Destroy target nonland permanent if another permanent with the same name is on the battlefield. Draw a card.
item.flavorText: "Strength in numbers? I think not." —Gerrard

item.name: Barrin's Unmaking
item.text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand if that permanent shares a color with the most common color among all permanents or a color tied for most common.

item.name: Blind Seer
item.text: {1}{U}: Target spell or permanent becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "I think he sees more than he lets on." —Gerrard

item.name: Breaking Wave
item.text: You may cast Breaking Wave any time you could cast an instant if you pay {2} more to cast it. Simultaneously untap all tapped creatures and tap all untapped creatures.

item.name: Collective Restraint
item.text: Domain — Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {X} for each creature he or she controls that's attacking you, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.

item.name: Crystal Spray
item.text:
Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one color word or basic land type with another until end of turn.
Draw a card.

item.name: Disrupt
item.text:
Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}.
Draw a card.
item.flavorText: Teferi wanted no part of Urza's battle plans, but both agreed the Phyrexian portal must be closed.

item.name: Distorting Wake
item.text: Return X target nonland permanents to their owners' hands.
item.flavorText: Gerrard savored a grim smile as the Phyrexian portals disappeared behind the Weatherlight.

item.name: Dream Thrush
item.text: Flying {T}: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Whether for good or ill, their arrival always means change.

item.name: Empress Galina
item.text: {U}{U}, {T}: Gain control of target legendary permanent. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
item.flavorText: "Above the waves you may be mighty indeed, but down here you belong to me."

item.name: Essence Leak
item.text: Enchant permanent If enchanted permanent is red or green, it has "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this permanent unless you pay its mana cost."
item.flavorText: "We define the boundaries of reality; they don't define us." —Teferi

item.name: Exclude
item.text:
Counter target creature spell.
Draw a card.
item.flavorText: "I don't have time for you right now." —Teferi

item.name: Fact or Fiction
item.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

item.name: Faerie Squadron
item.text: Kicker {3}{U} (You may pay an additional {3}{U} as you cast this spell.) If Faerie Squadron was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with flying.

item.name: Mana Maze
item.text: Players can't cast spells that share a color with the spell most recently cast this turn.
item.flavorText: "Those who know only one path to victory can never hope to triumph." —The Blind Seer

item.name: Manipulate Fate
item.text: Search your library for three cards, exile them, then shuffle your library. Draw a card.

item.name: Metathran Aerostat
item.text: Flying {X}{U}: You may put a creature card with converted mana cost X from your hand onto the battlefield. If you do, return Metathran Aerostat to its owner's hand.

item.name: Metathran Transport
item.text: Flying Metathran Transport can't be blocked by blue creatures. {U}: Target creature becomes blue until end of turn.

item.name: Metathran Zombie
item.text: {B}: Regenerate Metathran Zombie.
item.flavorText: "Rise, metathran. You shall serve a nobler cause in death." —Tsabo Tavoc, Phyrexian general

item.name: Opt
item.text:
Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.
Draw a card.
item.flavorText: "We need alternatives, Hanna," yelled Gerrard. "Now"

item.name: Phantasmal Terrain
item.text: Enchant land As Phantasmal Terrain enters the battlefield, choose a basic land type. Enchanted land is the chosen type.

item.name: Probe
item.text: Kicker {1}{B} (You may pay an additional {1}{B} as you cast this spell.) Draw three cards, then discard two cards. If Probe was kicked, target player discards two cards.

item.name: Prohibit
item.text: Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.) Counter target spell if its converted mana cost is 2 or less. If Prohibit was kicked, counter that spell if its converted mana cost is 4 or less instead.

item.name: Psychic Battle
item.text: Whenever a player chooses one or more targets, each player reveals the top card of his or her library. The player who reveals the card with the highest converted mana cost may change the target or targets. If two or more cards are tied for highest cost, the target or targets remain unchanged. Changing targets this way doesn't trigger this ability.

item.name: Rainbow Crow
item.text:
Flying
{1}: Rainbow Crow becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Children claim no two feathers are exactly the same color, then eagerly gather them for proof.

item.name: Repulse
item.text:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.
item.flavorText: "You aren't invited."

item.name: Sapphire Leech
item.text: Flying Blue spells you cast cost {U} more to cast.
item.flavorText: "The subject's wings are clearly vestigial. We suspect the gems somehow keep it aloft." —Tolarian research notes

item.flavorText: "Wings are but fins for swimming the sky." —Empress Galina

item.name: Shoreline Raider
item.text: Protection from Kavu
item.flavorText: "This strange new beast makes for an excellent meal. Get me more." —Empress Galina

item.name: Sky Weaver
item.text: {2}: Target white or black creature gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
item.flavorText: "Let my wisdom give you wings."

item.text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature. {B}, {T}: Target player loses 1 life.

item.text: {W}{W}, {T}: Target creature gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. {B}{B}, {T}: Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

item.name: Sway of Illusion
item.text:
Any number of target creatures become the color of your choice until end of turn.
Draw a card.
item.flavorText: "I suggest you take a closer look." —Tidal visionary

item.name: Teferi's Response
item.text:
Counter target spell or ability an opponent controls that targets a land you control. If a permanent's ability is countered this way, destroy that permanent.
Draw two cards.

item.name: Temporal Distortion
item.text: Whenever a creature or land becomes tapped, put an hourglass counter on it. Permanents with hourglass counters on them don't untap during their controllers' untap steps. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, remove all hourglass counters from permanents that player controls.

item.name: Tidal Visionary
item.text: {T}: Target creature becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Beneath the waves, things appear the way merfolk want them to.

item.name: Tolarian Emissary
item.text: Kicker {1}{W} (You may pay an additional {1}{W} as you cast this spell.) Flying When Tolarian Emissary enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target enchantment.

item.text: Flying {W}: Tower Drake gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Young tower drakes quickly learn to maneuver among Benalia's many spires.

item.text: Enchant creature As Traveler's Cloak enters the battlefield, choose a land type. When Traveler's Cloak enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature has landwalk of the chosen type.

item.name: Vodalian Hypnotist

item.flavorText: "Deceit is the heart of war."

item.text: When Vodalian Merchant enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.
item.flavorText: Not choosing sides in a war can be dangerous—but lucrative.

item.name: Vodalian Serpent
item.text: Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.) Vodalian Serpent can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. If Vodalian Serpent was kicked, it enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.

item.name: Wash Out
item.text: Return all permanents of the color of your choice to their owners' hands.
item.flavorText: "Rest now. You've neither won nor lost, but this battle is over for you just the same." —Teferi

item.name: Well-Laid Plans
item.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to a creature by another creature if they share a color.
item.flavorText: "I knew this day would come," said Urza. Looking at the destruction, Barrin sighed, "You don't have to revel in it."

item.name: Worldly Counsel
item.text: Domain — Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

item.name: Zanam Djinn
item.text: Flying Zanam Djinn gets -2/-2 as long as blue is the most common color among all permanents or is tied for most common.

item.name: Addle
item.text: Choose a color. Target player reveals his or her hand and you choose a card of that color from it. That player discards that card.
item.flavorText: "I'll wring out your tiny mind like a sponge." —Urborg witch

item.name: Agonizing Demise
item.text: Kicker {1}{R} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} as you cast this spell.) Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. If Agonizing Demise was kicked, it deals damage equal to that creature's power to the creature's controller.

item.name: Andradite Leech
item.text: Black spells you cast cost {B} more to cast. {B}: Andradite Leech gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Older specimens are completely encrusted with gems, which serve as both armor and weapons." —Tolarian research notes

item.name: Annihilate
item.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. Draw a card.
item.flavorText: "Whatever Yawgmoth marks, dies. There is no escape." —Tsabo Tavoc, Phyrexian general

item.name: Bog Initiate
item.text: {1}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "Urborg's magic is strong. Did Urza send you to protect us or to protect against us?" —Urborg witch, to Barrin

item.name: Cremate
item.text: Exile target card from a graveyard. Draw a card.
item.flavorText: Death's embrace need not be cold.

item.flavorText: Once an angel, now an abomination.

item.name: Defiling Tears
item.text: Until end of turn, target creature becomes black, gets +1/-1, and gains "{B}: Regenerate this creature."
item.flavorText: Serra's living warriors looked on in horror. "Where is our Lady now?" they cried.

item.name: Desperate Research
item.text: Name a card other than a basic land card. Then reveal the top seven cards of your library and put all of them with that name into your hand. Exile the rest.

item.name: Devouring Strossus
item.text: Flying, trample At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature. Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate Devouring Strossus.

item.name: Do or Die
item.text: Separate all creatures target player controls into two piles. Destroy all creatures in the pile of that player's choice. They can't be regenerated.

item.name: Dredge
item.text:
Sacrifice a creature or land.
Draw a card.
item.flavorText: "I'd strip away the world to see what's under it, but I'd never just leave it to these Phyrexian parasites and their false god." —Urborg witch

item.name: Duskwalker
item.text: Kicker {3}{B} (You may pay an additional {3}{B} as you cast this spell.) If Duskwalker was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

item.name: Exotic Curse
item.text: Enchant creature Domain — Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 for each basic land type among lands you control.
item.flavorText: Fouler than a necromancer's kiss. —Jamuraan expression

item.name: Firescreamer
item.text: {R}: Firescreamer gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: In the dark, it's nearly invisible—until it exhales.

item.name: Goham Djinn
item.text: {1}{B}: Regenerate Goham Djinn. Goham Djinn gets -2/-2 as long as black is the most common color among all permanents or is tied for most common.

item.name: Hate Weaver
item.text: {2}: Target blue or red creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Let my hate fuel your fury."

item.name: Hypnotic Cloud
item.text: Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.) Target player discards a card. If Hypnotic Cloud was kicked, that player discards three cards instead.

item.name: Marauding Knight
item.text: Protection from white Marauding Knight gets +1/+1 for each Plains your opponents control.
item.flavorText: "They ride our trails as if they were designed to," said the guard. "They were," replied Gerrard.

item.name: Mourning
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -2/-0. {B}: Return Mourning to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: Barrin waited for the nausea to pass or for Urza to say something else. He waited in vain.

item.name: Nightscape Apprentice
item.text: {U}, {T}: Put target creature you control on top of its owner's library. {R}, {T}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

item.name: Nightscape Master
item.text: {U}{U}, {T}: Return target creature to its owner's hand. {R}{R}, {T}: Nightscape Master deals 2 damage to target creature.

item.name: Phyrexian Battleflies
item.text: Flying {B}: Phyrexian Battleflies gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability no more than twice each turn.
item.flavorText: After encountering them, Squee finally lost his appetite for bugs.

item.name: Phyrexian Delver
item.text: When Phyrexian Delver enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You lose life equal to that card's converted mana cost.

item.name: Phyrexian Infiltrator
item.text: {2}{U}{U}: Exchange control of Phyrexian Infiltrator and target creature. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
item.flavorText: "It is Yawgmoth's will incarnate: an efficient machine that replaces inefficient flesh." —Tsabo Tavoc

item.name: Phyrexian Reaper
item.text: Whenever Phyrexian Reaper becomes blocked by a green creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.
item.flavorText: It desires only to help others shed the itchy wet skin of life.

item.name: Phyrexian Slayer
item.text:
Flying
Whenever Phyrexian Slayer becomes blocked by a white creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.
item.flavorText: Benalia was only the first nation victimized by Tsabo Tavoc's specialized killers.

item.name: Plague Spitter
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, Plague Spitter deals 1 damage to each creature and each player. When Plague Spitter is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Plague Spitter deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

item.name: Ravenous Rats
item.text: When Ravenous Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.
item.flavorText: Nothing is sacred to the rats. Everything is simply another meal.

item.name: Reckless Spite
item.text: Destroy two target nonblack creatures. You lose 5 life.
item.flavorText: "Death is such an exquisite sensation." —Tsabo Tavoc, Phyrexian general

item.name: Recover
item.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Draw a card.
item.flavorText: As Barrin exhumed his daughter's body, he finally realized the full price of his faith in Urza.

item.name: Scavenged Weaponry
item.text: Enchant creature When Scavenged Weaponry enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
item.flavorText: "The Phyrexians have progressed," admired Urza. "Their parts are interchangeable."

item.name: Soul Burn
item.text: Spend only black and/or red mana on X. Soul Burn deals X damage to target creature or player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more than the amount of {B} spent on X, the player's life total before Soul Burn dealt damage, or the creature's toughness.

item.name: Spreading Plague

item.flavorText: The cruelest strain of plague keeps its hosts alive long enough to return home and infect their families.

item.name: Tainted Well

item.flavorText: "No, you get the water. I ain't thirsty." —Squee

item.name: Trench Wurm
item.text: {2}{R}, {T}: Destroy target nonbasic land.
item.flavorText: "Their arrival marks the end of Yawgmoth's subtlety." —Urza

item.name: Tsabo's Assassin
item.text: {T}: Destroy target creature if it shares a color with the most common color among all permanents or a color tied for most common. A creature destroyed this way can't be regenerated.

item.name: Tsabo's Decree
item.text: Choose a creature type. Target player reveals his or her hand and discards all creature cards of that type. Then destroy all creatures of that type that player controls. They can't be regenerated.

item.name: Twilight's Call
item.text: You may cast Twilight's Call any time you could cast an instant if you pay {2} more to cast it. Each player returns all creature cards from his or her graveyard to the battlefield.
item.flavorText: Twilight falls. We rise. —Necropolis inscription

item.name: Urborg Emissary
item.text: Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.) When Urborg Emissary enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, return target permanent to its owner's hand.

item.name: Urborg Phantom
item.text: Urborg Phantom can't block. {U}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by Urborg Phantom this turn.
item.flavorText: A chilling fog with teeth of ice.

item.name: Urborg Shambler
item.text: Other black creatures get -1/-1.
item.flavorText: A writhing mass of rot, with sharp claws and a vicious spirit.

item.name: Urborg Skeleton
item.text: Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.) {B}: Regenerate Urborg Skeleton. If Urborg Skeleton was kicked, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.

item.name: Yawgmoth's Agenda
item.text: You can't cast more than one spell each turn. You may play cards from your graveyard. If a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

item.name: Ancient Kavu
item.text: {2}: Ancient Kavu becomes colorless until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Those with the ability to change their nature survived Phyrexia's biological attacks. Everything else died.

item.name: Bend or Break
item.text: Each player separates all nontoken lands he or she controls into two piles. For each player, one of his or her piles is chosen by one of his or her opponents of his or her choice. Destroy all lands in the chosen piles. Tap all lands in the other piles.

item.name: Breath of Darigaaz
item.text: Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.) Breath of Darigaaz deals 1 damage to each creature without flying and each player. If Breath of Darigaaz was kicked, it deals 4 damage to each creature without flying and each player instead.

item.name: Callous Giant
item.text: If a source would deal 3 or less damage to Callous Giant, prevent that damage.
item.flavorText: "The invasion has awoken slumbering mountains," noted Urza. "Good. We can use all the help we can get."

item.name: Chaotic Strike
item.text: Cast Chaotic Strike only during combat after blockers are declared. Flip a coin. If you win the flip, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Draw a card.

item.name: Collapsing Borders
item.text: Domain — At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player gains 1 life for each basic land type among lands he or she controls. Then Collapsing Borders deals 3 damage to him or her.

item.name: Crown of Flames
item.text: Enchant creature {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {R}: Return Crown of Flames to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: "All my life I've fought these monsters. Today I finish that fight." —Barrin

item.name: Firebrand Ranger
item.text: {G}, {T}: You may put a basic land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: A skilled ranger can glance at the mud on your boots and tell where you last camped.

item.name: Ghitu Fire
item.text: You may cast Ghitu Fire any time you could cast an instant if you pay {2} more to cast it. Ghitu Fire deals X damage to target creature or player.

item.name: Goblin Spy
item.text: Play with the top card of your library revealed.
item.flavorText: "Isn't he on our side?" "Yep." "Why's he spyin' on us?" "Don't ask."

item.name: Halam Djinn
item.text: Haste Halam Djinn gets -2/-2 as long as red is the most common color among all permanents or is tied for most common.

item.name: Hooded Kavu
item.text: {B}: Hooded Kavu gains fear until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
item.flavorText: The spread of its hood eclipses all hope.

item.name: Kavu Aggressor
item.text: Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.) Kavu Aggressor can't block. If Kavu Aggressor was kicked, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.

item.name: Kavu Monarch
item.text: Kavu creatures have trample. Whenever another Kavu enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Kavu Monarch.
item.flavorText: Kavu emerged all across Dominaria, but the first and the strongest came from Yavimaya.

item.name: Kavu Runner
item.text: Kavu Runner has haste as long as no opponent controls a white or blue creature.

item.name: Kavu Scout
item.text: Domain — Kavu Scout gets +1/+0 for each basic land type among lands you control.
item.flavorText: The kavu evolved for centuries deep inside Dominaria, and some can draw from its strength.

item.name: Lightning Dart
item.text: Lightning Dart deals 1 damage to target creature. If that creature is white or blue, Lightning Dart deals 4 damage to it instead.
item.flavorText: Broken and punctured by dozens of Phyrexian portals, the angry sky began to spit lightning back at the world.

item.name: Loafing Giant
item.text: Whenever Loafing Giant attacks or blocks, put the top card of your library into your graveyard. If that card is a land card, prevent all combat damage Loafing Giant would deal this turn.
item.flavorText: "Forget it. I'm not getting up today."

item.name: Mages' Contest
item.text: You and target spell's controller bid life. You start the bidding with a bid of 1. In turn order, each player may top the high bid. The bidding ends if the high bid stands. The high bidder loses life equal to the high bid. If you win the bidding, counter that spell.

item.name: Maniacal Rage
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.
item.flavorText: "Remember me?" Tahngarth roared. "Now I'll repay you for my stay on Rath"

item.name: Obliterate
item.text: Obliterate can't be countered. Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and lands. They can't be regenerated.
item.flavorText: For his family, Barrin made a funeral pyre of Tolaria.

item.name: Overload
item.text: Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.) Destroy target artifact if its converted mana cost is 2 or less. If Overload was kicked, destroy that artifact if its converted mana cost is 5 or less instead.

item.name: Pouncing Kavu
item.text: Kicker {2}{R} (You may pay an additional {2}{R} as you cast this spell.) First strike If Pouncing Kavu was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with haste.

item.name: Rage Weaver
item.text: {2}: Target black or green creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
item.flavorText: "Let my passion spur your victory."

item.name: Rogue Kavu
item.text: Whenever Rogue Kavu attacks alone, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "I know how this one feels," said Urza. "It's not like others of its kind and has been shunned for its differences."

item.name: Ruby Leech
item.text: First strike Red spells you cast cost {R} more to cast.
item.flavorText: "Its gems didn't stop pulsating until they were completely removed." —Tolarian research notes

item.name: Savage Offensive
item.text: Kicker {G} (You may pay an additional {G} as you cast this spell.) Creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn. If Savage Offensive was kicked, they get +1/+1 until end of turn.

item.name: Scarred Puma
item.text: Scarred Puma can't attack unless a black or green creature also attacks.
item.flavorText: It's not eager to lose the other eye.

item.name: Scorching Lava
item.text: Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.) Scorching Lava deals 2 damage to target creature or player. If Scorching Lava was kicked, that creature can't be regenerated this turn and if it would be put into a graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

item.name: Searing Rays
item.text: Choose a color. Searing Rays deals damage to each player equal to the number of creatures of that color that player controls.
item.flavorText: "This is a battle of pawns, for the highest stakes imaginable." —Urza

item.name: Shivan Emissary
item.text: Kicker {1}{B} (You may pay an additional {1}{B} as you cast this spell.) When Shivan Emissary enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

item.name: Shivan Harvest
item.text: {1}{R}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target nonbasic land.
item.flavorText: "The blood of your ancestors ran heavy on this soil. Now it's your turn to sacrifice for the glory of Shiv." —Viashino heretic

item.name: Skittish Kavu
item.text: Skittish Kavu gets +1/+1 as long as no opponent controls a white or blue creature.
item.flavorText: Fierce when roused, this breed of kavu is easily distracted by a strong voice or melodic tune.

item.name: Skizzik
item.text: Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.) Trample, haste At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Skizzik unless it was kicked.

item.name: Slimy Kavu
item.text: {T}: Target land becomes a Swamp until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Its slime liquefies the ground as efficiently as its fangs shred prey.

item.name: Stand or Fall
item.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, separate all creatures defending player controls into two piles. Only creatures in the pile of that player's choice can block this turn.

item.name: Stun
item.text: Target creature can't block this turn. Draw a card.
item.flavorText: "They certainly are well protected. Too bad for them they're not well balanced." —Sisay

item.name: Tectonic Instability
item.text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield, tap all lands its controller controls.
item.flavorText: "Think of the problems we'll face if you uproot entire continents," said Urza. "I have," replied Teferi, "but the alternative is worse."

item.name: Thunderscape Apprentice
item.text: {B}, {T}: Target player loses 1 life. {G}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

item.name: Thunderscape Master
item.text: {B}{B}, {T}: Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. {G}{G}, {T}: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.

item.name: Tribal Flames
item.text: Domain — Tribal Flames deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.
item.flavorText: "Fire is the universal language." —Jhoira, master artificer

item.name: Turf Wound
item.text:
Target player can't play land cards this turn.
Draw a card.
item.flavorText: "I can't imagine how anyone lives in Shiv, let alone why they choose to stay." —Sisay

item.name: Urza's Rage
item.text: Kicker {8}{R} (You may pay an additional {8}{R} as you cast this spell.) Urza's Rage can't be countered by spells or abilities. Urza's Rage deals 3 damage to target creature or player. If Urza's Rage was kicked, instead it deals 10 damage to that creature or player and the damage can't be prevented.

item.name: Viashino Grappler
item.text: {G}: Viashino Grappler gains trample until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "They've returned for the mana rig, but it no longer belongs to them." —Viashino bey

item.name: Zap
item.text:
Zap deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
Draw a card.
item.flavorText: "All this time I thought Squee was useless," chuckled Sisay. "Who knew he'd be such a good shot?"

item.name: Aggressive Urge
item.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Draw a card.
item.flavorText: The power of the wild, concentrated in a single charge.

item.name: Bind
item.text: Counter target activated ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.) Draw a card.
item.flavorText: "The battlefield is cluttered enough. Be still." —Multani, maro-sorcerer

item.name: Blurred Mongoose
item.text: Blurred Mongoose can't be countered. Shroud (This permanent can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
item.flavorText: "The mongoose blew out its candle and was asleep in bed before the room went dark." —Llanowar fable

item.name: Canopy Surge
item.text: Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.) Canopy Surge deals 1 damage to each creature with flying and each player. If Canopy Surge was kicked, it deals 4 damage to each creature with flying and each player instead.

item.name: Elfhame Sanctuary
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, you skip your draw step this turn and shuffle your library.

item.name: Elvish Champion
item.text: Other Elf creatures get +1/+1 and have forestwalk. (They're unblockable as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
item.flavorText: "For what are leaves but countless blades To fight a countless foe on high." —Skyshroud hymn

item.name: Explosive Growth
item.text: Kicker {5} (You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell.) Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If Explosive Growth was kicked, that creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn instead.

item.name: Fertile Ground
item.text: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds one mana of any color to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).
item.flavorText: As Phyrexians descended, Multani paused to reflect on the beauty that might never be seen again.

item.name: Harrow
item.text: As an additional cost to cast Harrow, sacrifice a land. Search your library for up to two basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: No spot in nature is truly barren.

item.name: Jade Leech
item.text: Green spells you cast cost {G} more to cast.
item.flavorText: "It took magic to extract one of the stones and five people to carry it." —Tolarian research notes

item.name: Kavu Chameleon
item.text: Kavu Chameleon can't be countered. {G}: Kavu Chameleon becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "They weren't part of my plan, but Gaea insisted." —Urza

item.name: Kavu Climber
item.text: When Kavu Climber enters the battlefield, draw a card.
item.flavorText: The appearance of the first kavu surprised Multani. As they continued to emerge, he no longer had any doubts about Yavimaya's ability to defend herself.

item.name: Kavu Lair
item.text: Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield, its controller draws a card.
item.flavorText: As a dark rain of Phyrexians fell from the sky, fountains of kavu erupted from the ground.

item.name: Kavu Titan
item.text: Kicker {2}{G} (You may pay an additional {2}{G} as you cast this spell.) If Kavu Titan was kicked, it enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it and with trample.

item.name: Llanowar Cavalry
item.text: {W}: Llanowar Cavalry gains vigilance until end of turn.
item.flavorText: For the first time, elves welcomed Benalish soldiers into the forest with something other than arrows.

item.name: Llanowar Elite
item.text: Kicker {8} (You may pay an additional {8} as you cast this spell.) Trample If Llanowar Elite was kicked, it enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it.

item.name: Llanowar Vanguard
item.text: {T}: Llanowar Vanguard gets +0/+4 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Llanowar rallied around Eladamri's banner and united in his name.

item.name: Might Weaver
item.text: {2}: Target red or white creature gains trample until end of turn. (If the creature would deal enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it deal the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)
item.flavorText: "Let my strength harden your resolve."

item.name: Molimo, Maro-Sorcerer
item.text: Trample (If this creature would deal enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it deal the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.) Molimo, Maro-Sorcerer's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.
item.flavorText: "The world calls and I answer."

item.name: Nomadic Elf
item.text: {1}{G}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "I've journeyed across Dominaria. Phyrexians are everywhere. Plague is everywhere. There's no place left to hide."

item.name: Pincer Spider
item.text: Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.) Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) If Pincer Spider was kicked, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.

item.name: Pulse of Llanowar
item.text: If a basic land you control is tapped for mana, it produces mana of a color of your choice instead of any other type.
item.flavorText: "Gaea's memory is eternal, and she exists in all things." —Molimo, maro-sorcerer

item.name: Quirion Elves
item.text: As Quirion Elves enters the battlefield, choose a color. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. {T}: Add one mana of the chosen color to your mana pool.

item.name: Quirion Sentinel
item.text: When Quirion Sentinel enters the battlefield, add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: All elvenkind stood against Phyrexia. The Quirion nation deployed its most spiritual adepts, who wielded the power of their native soil.

item.name: Quirion Trailblazer
item.text: When Quirion Trailblazer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. If you do, shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: "All that matters is the path ahead."

item.name: Restock
item.text: Return two target cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Restock.
item.flavorText: "We hid such stockpiles all over Rath. We should continue that practice here." —Lin Sivvi

item.name: Rooting Kavu
item.text: When Rooting Kavu is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may exile it. If you do, shuffle all creature cards from your graveyard into your library.

item.name: Saproling Infestation
item.text: Whenever a player kicks a spell, you put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.

item.name: Saproling Symbiosis
item.text: You may cast Saproling Symbiosis any time you could cast an instant if you pay {2} more to cast it. Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield for each creature you control.

item.name: Scouting Trek
item.text: Search your library for any number of basic land cards. Reveal those cards, then shuffle your library and put them on top of it.
item.flavorText: "I have chosen my path. Who will walk it with me?" —Eladamri

item.name: Serpentine Kavu
item.text: {R}: Serpentine Kavu gains haste until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Under Yavimaya's peaceful facade beat the hearts of many savage beasts.

item.name: Sulam Djinn
item.text: Trample Sulam Djinn gets -2/-2 as long as green is the most common color among all permanents or is tied for most common.

item.name: Tangle
item.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. Each attacking creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
item.flavorText: Gaea battles rampant death with abundant life.

item.name: Thicket Elemental
item.text: Kicker {1}{G} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} as you cast this spell.) When Thicket Elemental enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, you may reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. If you do, put that card onto the battlefield and shuffle all other cards revealed this way into your library.

item.name: Thornscape Apprentice
item.text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature. {R}, {T}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

item.name: Thornscape Master
item.text: {R}{R}, {T}: Thornscape Master deals 2 damage to target creature. {W}{W}, {T}: Target creature gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

item.name: Tranquility
item.text: Destroy all enchantments.
item.flavorText: The plagues robbed Dominaria of all but its dreams. Eladamri hoped dreams were enough.

item.name: Treefolk Healer
item.text: {2}{W}, {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
item.flavorText: Protected by druids for untold centuries, the forest began to return the favor.

item.name: Utopia Tree
item.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: The fruit of this fabled tree takes on the flavor of whatever food you love most.

item.name: Verdeloth the Ancient
item.text: Kicker {X} (You may pay an additional {X} as you cast this spell.) Saproling creatures and other Treefolk creatures get +1/+1. When Verdeloth the Ancient enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, put X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield.

item.name: Verduran Emissary
item.text: Kicker {1}{R} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} as you cast this spell.) When Verduran Emissary enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target artifact. It can't be regenerated.

item.name: Vigorous Charge
item.text: Kicker {W} (You may pay an additional {W} as you cast this spell.) Target creature gains trample until end of turn. Whenever that creature deals combat damage this turn, if Vigorous Charge was kicked, you gain life equal to that damage.

item.name: Wallop
item.text: Destroy target blue or black creature with flying.
item.flavorText: In Yavimaya, flying low to join a battle can be a costly mistake.

item.name: Wandering Stream
item.text: Domain — You gain 2 life for each basic land type among lands you control.
item.flavorText: "Dominaria touches us all." —Molimo, maro-sorcerer

item.name: Whip Silk
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has reach. (It can block creatures with flying.) {G}: Return Whip Silk to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: Llanowar forges weapons of steel. Yavimaya grows her weapons within.

item.name: Absorb
item.text: Counter target spell. You gain 3 life.
item.flavorText: "Your presumption is your downfall."

item.name: Æther Rift
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, discard a card at random. If you discard a creature card this way, return it from your graveyard to the battlefield unless any player pays 5 life.

item.name: Angelic Shield
item.text:
Creatures you control get +0/+1.
Sacrifice Angelic Shield: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: "If only an angel's wings could shelter us all." —Barrin

item.name: Armadillo Cloak
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample. Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.
item.flavorText: "Don't laugh. It works." —Yavimaya ranger

item.name: Armored Guardian
item.text: {1}{W}{W}: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. {1}{U}{U}: Armored Guardian gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

item.name: Artifact Mutation
item.text: Destroy target artifact. It can't be regenerated. Put X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is that artifact's converted mana cost.
item.flavorText: "From shards and splinters I call forth my living horde." —Molimo, maro-sorcerer

item.name: Aura Mutation
item.text: Destroy target enchantment. Put X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is that enchantment's converted mana cost.
item.flavorText: "Life can be found in all things, even things unnatural." —Multani, maro-sorcerer

item.name: Aura Shards
item.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.
item.flavorText: Gaea forged her soldiers into self-wielding weapons that struck down all impurities.

item.name: Backlash
item.text: Tap target untapped creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to its controller.
item.flavorText: Darigaaz decided his foe would be more useful as a weapon.

item.name: Barrin's Spite
item.text: Choose two target creatures controlled by the same player. Their controller chooses and sacrifices one of them. Return the other to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: "Only vengeance matters now." —Barrin

item.name: Blazing Specter
item.text: Flying, haste Whenever Blazing Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

item.name: Captain Sisay
item.text: {T}: Search your library for a legendary card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: Her leadership forged the Weatherlight's finest crew.

item.name: Cauldron Dance
item.text: Cast Cauldron Dance only during combat. Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step. You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Its controller sacrifices it at the beginning of the next end step.

item.name: Charging Troll
item.text: Vigilance {G}: Regenerate Charging Troll.
item.flavorText: They stop for nothing, not even the end of a battle.

item.name: Cinder Shade
item.text: {B}: Cinder Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn. {R}, Sacrifice Cinder Shade: Cinder Shade deals damage equal to its power to target creature.

item.name: Coalition Victory
item.text: You win the game if you control a land of each basic land type and a creature of each color.
item.flavorText: "You can build a perfect machine out of imperfect parts." —Urza

item.name: Crosis, the Purger
item.text: Flying Whenever Crosis, the Purger deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{B}. If you do, choose a color, then that player reveals his or her hand and discards all cards of that color.

item.name: Darigaaz, the Igniter
item.text: Flying Whenever Darigaaz, the Igniter deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, choose a color, then that player reveals his or her hand and Darigaaz deals damage to the player equal to the number of cards of that color revealed this way.

item.name: Dromar, the Banisher
item.text: Flying Whenever Dromar, the Banisher deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{U}. If you do, choose a color, then return all creatures of that color to their owners' hands.

item.name: Dueling Grounds
item.text: No more than one creature can attack each turn. No more than one creature can block each turn.
item.flavorText: "You think you can stop me?" hissed Tsabo. "I think I can kill you," replied Gerrard.

item.name: Fires of Yavimaya
item.text: Creatures you control have haste. Sacrifice Fires of Yavimaya: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

item.name: Frenzied Tilling
item.text: Destroy target land. Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: "Beneath her scars, Dominaria's beauty yet shines." —Multani, maro-sorcerer

item.name: Galina's Knight
item.text: Protection from red
item.flavorText: "Are they on our side?" asked Sisay. "If they kill Phyrexians they are," replied Gerrard.

item.name: Hanna, Ship's Navigator
item.text: {1}{W}{U}, {T}: Return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
item.flavorText: "I never thought I'd spend my life fighting. I'm a maker, not a destroyer."

item.name: Heroes' Reunion
item.text: Target player gains 7 life.
item.flavorText: "You helped save my people from a Phyrexian fate. Did you think I wouldn't return the favor?" —Eladamri, to Gerrard

item.name: Horned Cheetah
item.text: Whenever Horned Cheetah deals damage, you gain that much life.
item.flavorText: "I think she wants us to eat it," said Squee, staring at the oily carcass the cheetah had dragged to their fire.

item.name: Hunting Kavu
item.text: {1}{R}{G}, {T}: Exile Hunting Kavu and target creature without flying that's attacking you.
item.flavorText: Dominarians gladly fought alongside kavu . . . until the kavu figured out some Dominarians were quite tasty.

item.name: Kangee, Aerie Keeper
item.text: Kicker {X}{2} (You may pay an additional {X}{2} as you cast this spell.) Flying When Kangee, Aerie Keeper enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, put X feather counters on it. Other Bird creatures get +1/+1 for each feather counter on Kangee, Aerie Keeper.

item.name: Llanowar Knight
item.text: Protection from black
item.flavorText: Her armor and steed were borrowed, but her courage was hers alone.

item.name: Lobotomy
item.text: Target player reveals his or her hand, then you choose a card other than a basic land card from it. Search that player's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as the chosen card and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

item.name: Meteor Storm
item.text: {2}{R}{G}, Discard two cards at random: Meteor Storm deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: The storm wasn't an omen. It was the fulfillment of one.

item.name: Noble Panther
item.text: {1}: Noble Panther gains first strike until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Unlike many hunters, these panthers have no need for camouflage. They're fast enough to catch any prey.

item.name: Ordered Migration
item.text: Domain — Put a 1/1 blue Bird creature token with flying onto the battlefield for each basic land type among lands you control.
item.flavorText: "Birds reach all parts of the world," said Barrin. "They will make excellent scouts."

item.name: Overabundance
item.text: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana to his or her mana pool of any type that land produced, and Overabundance deals 1 damage to him or her.

item.name: Plague Spores
item.text: Destroy target nonblack creature and target land. They can't be regenerated.
item.flavorText: "Breathe deep, Dominaria. Breathe deep and die." —Tsabo Tavoc, Phyrexian general

item.name: Pyre Zombie
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if Pyre Zombie is in your graveyard, you may pay {1}{B}{B}. If you do, return Pyre Zombie from your graveyard to your hand. {1}{R}{R}, Sacrifice Pyre Zombie: Pyre Zombie deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

item.name: Raging Kavu
item.text: Flash Haste
item.flavorText: It took Yavimaya a thousand years to breed them, but it took only seconds for them to prove their worth.

item.name: Reckless Assault
item.text: {1}, Pay 2 life: Reckless Assault deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: "How will you fight an enemy that cares nothing for itself?" —The Blind Seer

item.name: Recoil
item.text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Then that player discards a card.
item.flavorText: Anything sent into a plagued world is bound to come back infected.

item.name: Reviving Vapors
item.text: Reveal the top three cards of your library and put one of them into your hand. You gain life equal to that card's converted mana cost. Put all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.

item.name: Riptide Crab
item.text: Vigilance When Riptide Crab is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.
item.flavorText: It sleeps with its claws open.

item.name: Rith, the Awakener
item.text: Flying Whenever Rith, the Awakener deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{G}. If you do, choose a color, then put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield for each permanent of that color.

item.name: Sabertooth Nishoba
item.text: Trample, protection from blue and from red
item.flavorText: They sneer at the terrestrial dangers found on peaks and shores, eager to prove themselves against new and even mightier foes.

item.name: Samite Archer
item.text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn. {T}: Samite Archer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: "I can preserve ten lives by taking one."

item.name: Seer's Vision
item.text: Your opponents play with their hands revealed. Sacrifice Seer's Vision: Look at target player's hand and choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

item.name: Shivan Zombie
item.text: Protection from white
item.flavorText: Barbarians long for a glorious death in battle. Phyrexia was eager to grant that wish.

item.name: Simoon
item.text: Simoon deals 1 damage to each creature target opponent controls.
item.flavorText: Hot wind whipped up as if the weather itself wanted to fight Phyrexians.

item.name: Sleeper's Robe
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.

item.name: Slinking Serpent
item.text: Forestwalk
item.flavorText: It winds its way through undergrowth as easily as it swims through shallows.

item.name: Smoldering Tar
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, target player loses 1 life. Sacrifice Smoldering Tar: Smoldering Tar deals 4 damage to target creature. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

item.name: Spinal Embrace
item.text: Cast Spinal Embrace only during combat. Untap target creature you don't control and gain control of it. It gains haste until end of turn. At the beginning of the next end step, sacrifice it. If you do, you gain life equal to its toughness.

item.name: Stalking Assassin
item.text: {3}{U}, {T}: Tap target creature. {3}{B}, {T}: Destroy target tapped creature.

item.name: Sterling Grove
item.text: Other enchantments you control have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.) {1}, Sacrifice Sterling Grove: Search your library for an enchantment card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.

item.name: Teferi's Moat
item.text: As Teferi's Moat enters the battlefield, choose a color. Creatures of the chosen color without flying can't attack you.
item.flavorText: "Isolation is not the answer." —Urza, to Teferi.

item.name: Treva, the Renewer
item.text: Flying Whenever Treva, the Renewer deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{W}. If you do, choose a color, then you gain 1 life for each permanent of that color.

item.name: Tsabo Tavoc
item.text: First strike, protection from legendary creatures {B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target legendary creature. It can't be regenerated.
item.flavorText: "I might almost pity my enemies—if it wasn't so amusing to watch them die."

item.name: Undermine
item.text: Counter target spell. Its controller loses 3 life.
item.flavorText: "Which would you like first, the insult or the injury?"

item.name: Urborg Drake
item.text: Flying Urborg Drake attacks each turn if able.
item.flavorText: Relentless as the sea, remorseless as death.

item.name: Vicious Kavu
item.text: Whenever Vicious Kavu attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: As battle raged in Shiv, a strange new ally appeared from below the ravaged ground.

item.name: Vile Consumption
item.text: All creatures have "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this creature unless you pay 1 life."
item.flavorText: The plague moved faster than an army and was far more deadly.

item.name: Vodalian Zombie
item.text: Protection from green
item.flavorText: "Every last one of you will become my servant. It's a shame you won't live to see the irony." —Tsabo Tavoc, Phyrexian general

item.name: Void
item.text: Choose a number. Destroy all artifacts and creatures with converted mana cost equal to that number. Then target player reveals his or her hand and discards all nonland cards with converted mana cost equal to the number.

item.name: Voracious Cobra
item.text:
First strike
Whenever Voracious Cobra deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature.
item.flavorText: There's no known antidote for the cobra's venom . . . or its appetite.

item.name: Wings of Hope
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+3 and has flying.
item.flavorText: Urza knew Phyrexians would come through the air and sent his soldiers to greet them.

item.name: Yavimaya Barbarian
item.text: Protection from blue
item.flavorText: Not all elves embrace the pastoral life. Some still roam the forest's edge, forever making war against their hated enemies.

item.name: Yavimaya Kavu
item.text: Yavimaya Kavu's power is equal to the number of red creatures on the battlefield. Yavimaya Kavu's toughness is equal to the number of green creatures on the battlefield.
item.flavorText: Kavu hunt prey in packs—one kavu hunts a pack of prey.

item.text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

item.name: Deliver
item.text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

item.name: Stand
item.text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

item.name: Stand
item.text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

item.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

item.name: Malice
item.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

item.name: Spite
item.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

item.name: Spite
item.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

item.name: Pain
item.text: Destroy target land.

item.name: Pain
item.text: Destroy target land.

item.name: Suffering
item.text: Destroy target land.

item.name: Suffering
item.text: Destroy target land.

item.name: Assault
item.text: Put a 3/3 green Elephant creature token onto the battlefield.

item.name: Assault
item.text: Put a 3/3 green Elephant creature token onto the battlefield.

item.name: Battery
item.text: Put a 3/3 green Elephant creature token onto the battlefield.

item.name: Battery
item.text: Put a 3/3 green Elephant creature token onto the battlefield.

item.name: Wane
item.text: Destroy target enchantment.

item.name: Wane
item.text: Destroy target enchantment.

item.name: Wax
item.text: Destroy target enchantment.

item.name: Wax
item.text: Destroy target enchantment.

item.name: Alloy Golem
item.text: As Alloy Golem enters the battlefield, choose a color. Alloy Golem is the chosen color. (It's still an artifact.)
item.flavorText: "We turned old weapons into new warriors." —Jhoira, master artificer

item.name: Bloodstone Cameo
item.text: {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "The stone whispers to me of dragon's fire and darkness. I wish I'd never pried it from the figurehead of that sunken Keldon longship." —Isel, master carver

item.name: Chromatic Sphere
item.text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Chromatic Sphere: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Draw a card.
item.flavorText: "Let insight and energy be your guides." —The Blind Seer, to Gerrard

item.name: Crosis's Attendant
item.text: {1}, Sacrifice Crosis's Attendant: Add {U}{B}{R} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "Crosis is the eye of the ur-dragon, piercing illusion and darkness."

item.name: Darigaaz's Attendant
item.text: {1}, Sacrifice Darigaaz's Attendant: Add {B}{R}{G} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "Darigaaz is the breath of the ur-dragon, burning away the burdens of mortality."

item.name: Drake-Skull Cameo
item.text: {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "A strange skull was turned up by an Ephran farmer's plow. I traded a copper ring for the ‘ox skull.' It resonates of the sea and danger." —Isel, master carver

item.name: Dromar's Attendant
item.text: {1}, Sacrifice Dromar's Attendant: Add {W}{U}{B} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "Dromar is the wings of the ur-dragon, sweeping away all opposition."

item.name: Juntu Stakes
item.text: Creatures with power 1 or less don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
item.flavorText: "Those who can't survive are of no consequence." —Tsabo Tavoc

item.name: Lotus Guardian
item.text: Flying {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: Lotus fields are too valuable to leave undefended.

item.name: Phyrexian Altar
item.text: Sacrifice a creature: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "Your life was meaningless, but your death will glorify Yawgmoth." —Tsabo Tavoc

item.name: Phyrexian Lens
item.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "There's nothing I wouldn't give to achieve victory. Can you say the same?" —Tsabo Tavoc, to Gerrard

item.name: Planar Portal
item.text: {6}, {T}: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: The sky split, and the air crackled and roiled. The Phyrexian invasion of Dominaria had finally begun.

item.name: Power Armor
item.text: Domain — {3}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.
item.flavorText: "Great peril demands formidable weaponry." —Urza

item.name: Rith's Attendant
item.text: {1}, Sacrifice Rith's Attendant: Add {R}{G}{W} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "Rith is the claw of the ur-dragon, scattering seeds of devastation."

item.name: Seashell Cameo
item.text: {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "Today a seashell fell from the empty sky here in Kinymu, a hundred leagues from the sea. I'm torn—shall I carve a woman or a bird?" —Isel, master carver

item.name: Sparring Golem
item.text: Whenever Sparring Golem becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.
item.flavorText: "Part drill sergeant, part training dummy," thought Gerrard. "I hope it can stand up to a real war."

item.name: Tek
item.text: Tek gets +0/+2 as long as you control a Plains, has flying as long as you control an Island, gets +2/+0 as long as you control a Swamp, has first strike as long as you control a Mountain, and has trample as long as you control a Forest.

item.name: Tigereye Cameo
item.text: {T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "An elvish adventurer unearthed this stone in Jolrael's jungle. Now it's truly fit for display in one of her palaces." —Isel, master carver

item.name: Treva's Attendant
item.text: {1}, Sacrifice Treva's Attendant: Add {G}{W}{U} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "Treva is the voice of the ur-dragon, demanding cries of worship."

item.name: Troll-Horn Cameo
item.text: {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "I found a troll-horn fragment in the wooded foothills of Hurloon, and it keeps growing larger. I wonder, is the horn recreating itself or the troll?" —Isel, master carver

item.name: Tsabo's Web
item.text: When Tsabo's Web enters the battlefield, draw a card. Each land with an activated ability that isn't a mana ability doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

item.name: Urza's Filter
item.text: Multicolored spells cost up to {2} less to cast.
item.flavorText: "It's a tool for aiding my other tools," explained Urza. "Now they'll work in harmony."

item.name: Ancient Spring
item.text: Ancient Spring enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Ancient Spring: Add {W}{B} to your mana pool.

item.name: Archaeological Dig
item.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}, Sacrifice Archaeological Dig: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

item.name: Coastal Tower
item.text: Coastal Tower enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: The Capashen built the highest towers in Benalia to afford themselves the best view.

item.name: Elfhame Palace
item.text: Elfhame Palace enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: Llanowar has seven elfhames, or kingdoms, each with its own ruler. Their palaces are objects of awe, wonder, and envy.

item.name: Geothermal Crevice
item.text: Geothermal Crevice enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Geothermal Crevice: Add {B}{G} to your mana pool.

item.name: Irrigation Ditch
item.text: Irrigation Ditch enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Irrigation Ditch: Add {G}{U} to your mana pool.

item.name: Keldon Necropolis
item.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{4}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Keldon Necropolis deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

item.name: Salt Marsh
item.text: Salt Marsh enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: Only death breeds in stagnant water. —Urborg saying

item.name: Shivan Oasis
item.text: Shivan Oasis enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: Only the hardiest explorers survive to eat the fruit.

item.name: Sulfur Vent
item.text: Sulfur Vent enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Sulfur Vent: Add {U}{R} to your mana pool.

item.name: Tinder Farm
item.text: Tinder Farm enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Tinder Farm: Add {R}{W} to your mana pool.

item.name: Urborg Volcano
item.text: Urborg Volcano enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: Deep in the heart of Urborg lie massive volcanoes whose thick black smoke covers the land with perpetual darkness.
